channel.title: Questions before i start
channel.description:
1. What is the min amount it would cost to keep my server 24/7 with it not on my ip? 2. how do i add custom items eg. owner cape colour bandos ect 3. is there a program so i can make new customs
plz help me give me link ect :)

item.title: Questions before i start
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

vps info: www.google.com
modelling info in the client section on this forum

Read full topic

item.title: Questions before i start

@brad_simpson298 wrote:

can u send me a link on how much it is to have 24/7?? link where i can find info

Read full topic

item.title: Questions before i start
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You can get a free trial vps if you search hard enough, which are shitty ones,
else starting from around 12$ I already saw (12/month) but don’t count on quality then.

Enough tutorials on adding models to your server.

There are tutorials on how making customs in the client section to, but don’t expect to be making your dream items in a few weeks, it needs a lot of learning and practicing… like everything.

Read full topic
